name: Sentry
description: Sentry is a realtime event logging and aggregation platform

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for a particular Django installation. This is used to provide cryptographic signing, and should be set to a unique, unpredictable value.

SENTRY_URL_PREFIX.description: Your applications URL, no trailing slash

SERVER_EMAIL.description: Reply to address for outgoing email

SENTRY_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The administrative email for this installation. Note: This will be reported back to getsentry.com as the point of contact. See the beacon documentation for more information.
